name: Bleak Canvas
description:
Bleak Canvas is a 3D adventure, and puzzle game which its main mechanic is focus on using lights to progress through the level.  Currently a university project I have been working on for a while.

Game Instructions

The player are able to re use light to further progress through the level. Players are also able to interact with moveable blocks that acts as a place to jump on or to apply pressure to the pressure plate.

Keybinds

Movement - W/A/S/D

Interact - E key

Jump - Spacebar

Platform

PC - Currently being made for only pc users

Credits

Code - Dan, Charlie

Made by - Pat Turner
